full_description:
XOC G300 512GB PCIe 3.0 NVMe SSD

The XOC G300 512GB PCIe 3.0 NVMe SSD is a high-performance storage solution designed to take your computing experience to the next level. This G300 SSD is built with cutting-edge technology, including a PCIe Gen 3x4 interface and NVMe 1.3 compliance, enabling lightning-fast data transfer speeds and smooth compatibility with contemporary systems. With a substantial capacity of 512GB, XOC G300 has plenty of room to store your games, programs, and multimedia files, and its small form factor makes it perfect for both desktops and laptops. With read speeds of up to 3,500MB/s and write rates of up to 3,200MB/s, you can access your data quickly and perform better in demanding tasks like gaming, content production, and data-intensive apps. The XOC G300 is not only about speed; it is also designed to last. With an excellent durability rating of up to 2,000 TBW, this XOC G300 SSD is designed to resist the rigors of regular operation and provide long-term dependability. The XOC G300 includes built-in data security and error correction features, assuring the integrity and protection of your data at all times. Whether you're a gamer looking for faster load times and smoother gaming, a content producer working with massive video files, or a professional needing dependable storage for your workloads, the XOC G300 provides the performance, durability, and peace of mind you require. Upgrade to the XOC G300 to maximize the performance of your machine.
